text: <@U04MN8Q0PA7> try using single ' to open and close the "content" value

Hello, Everyone,
Is it possible to add the text field in the theme.json to use the text in theme?
Tried to like this, but validation error.
Please help me :pray:
text field is not possible in the themes fields.json - see here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes#fields-json>
